name: North Town
storyline:
So this is your new home.
You have arrived here on knörrs, with the hope in your heart and droplets of brine splashing on your cheeks. At first you saw only the snowy mountains jutting out of the horizon, then the adjacent slopes, covered with pine forests and finally – the gaunt plain belying the abundance of natural resources.
What more could you possibly need in your domain? It’s time to get off your ship and settle down.
summary: Conquer the icy lands and build the most magnificent city of the North! Admire the vivid scenery, meet the gods and interact with the locals. Become the master of economy, develop your settlement, and rule the North Town!
